title: How to Completely Shut Down a Kindle Paperwhite

steps.title: Locate the Power button.
steps.content: Locate the Power button. The Power button is at the bottom right part of the device beside the USB port.

steps.title: Press and hold the Power button.
steps.content: Press and hold the Power button. Do this for about 5 to 7 seconds until the charge indicator light beside the Power button blinks.

steps.title: Release the Power button.
steps.content: Release the Power button. The screen will go blank after pressing and holding the Power button; as soon as the screen goes blank, release the Power button.
